ComicInfo.Summary:
When the last vestiges of normalcy are stripped from Michael Grey's life, he is finally confront-ed by his past in the far-flung cosmos...and the enemies he made there. Can the Stronghold put the broken pieces of Grey's life back together before the terrors he battled in the stars follow him to our fragile Earth?
Phil Hester (The Coffin, Deathstroke, The Darkness, SHIPWRECK) and Ryan Kelly (The Wicked & The Divine, Lucifer, Saucer Country) weave a tale of cosmic horror, high-adventure and tragic romance unlike anything else in comics.
